name: Question or Challenge
about: Challenge an assumption, conclusion, or interpretation in the experiment
title: "[Question][Day X] Short description"

---

## Target
Which analysis or conclusion are you questioning?

## Your Question
State your challenge clearly and precisely.

## Reasoning
Why do you think this point needs clarification or correction?

## Optional Counter-View
If you have an alternative interpretation, describe it here.
